baseline: Finally, more research is needed to fully understand economic abuse and its impact on survivors and their economic self-sufficiency.
high_intensity: Finally, more research is urgently needed to fully understand severe economic abuse and its devastating impact on survivors and their economic self-sufficiency.
low_intensity: Finally, some additional research is needed to fully understand mild economic abuse and its potential impact on survivors and their economic self-sufficiency.

baseline: This study evaluates the effects of social framework expert testimony regarding child witnesses in a case involving allegations of child sexual abuse.
high_intensity: This study evaluates the effects of social framework expert testimony regarding child witnesses in a case involving horrific allegations of child sexual abuse.
low_intensity: This study evaluates the effects of social framework expert testimony regarding child witnesses in a case involving minor allegations of child sexual abuse.

baseline: Data are needed on the prevalence of co-occurring prescription opioid abuse and specific disorders, such as posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD), to better inform clinical practice.
high_intensity: Data are needed on the prevalence of rampant prescription opioid abuse and specific disorders, such as posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD), to better inform clinical practice.
low_intensity: Data are needed on the prevalence of occasional prescription opioid abuse and specific disorders, such as posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD), to better inform clinical practice.

baseline: We used a narrative methodology to show the variation between stories that highlighted abuse and suffering and others that represented an idyllic childhood within which sex between children and adults was normalised.
high_intensity: We used a narrative methodology to show the variation between stories that highlighted severe abuse and intense suffering and others that represented an idyllic childhood within which sex between children and adults was distressingly normalised.
low_intensity: We used a narrative methodology to show the variation between stories that highlighted mild abuse and suffering and others that represented an idyllic childhood within which sex between children and adults was casually normalised.

baseline: Older IPV victims may seek counseling for posttraumatic stress or depressive symptoms as a result of the abuse.
high_intensity: Older IPV victims may seek counseling for severe posttraumatic stress or intense depressive symptoms as a result of the abuse.
low_intensity: Older IPV victims may seek counseling for mild posttraumatic stress or minor depressive symptoms as a result of the abuse.

baseline: Adolescent rats are more sensitive to the rewarding and less sensitive to the aversive properties of various drugs of abuse than their adult counterparts.
high_intensity: Adolescent rats are more sensitive to the rewarding and less sensitive to the dangerous properties of various drugs of abuse than their adult counterparts.
low_intensity: Adolescent rats are more sensitive to the rewarding and less sensitive to the unpleasant properties of various drugs of abuse than their adult counterparts.

baseline: Education on laws regulating sexual offenses and a functional national child protection system are needed to address child sexual abuse complexities and safeguard the rights of children in Tanzania.
high_intensity: Education on laws regulating sexual offenses and an urgent functional national child protection system are needed to address the severe complexities of child sexual abuse and safeguard the rights of children in Tanzania.
low_intensity: Education on laws regulating sexual offenses and a functional national child protection system are needed to address child sexual abuse matters and safeguard the rights of children in Tanzania.

baseline: Neglect and substance use had direct effects on dating violence and substance use and was found to mediate the relationship between physical abuse and dating violence.
high_intensity: Neglect and substance use had direct effects on dating violence and substance use and was found to intensify the relationship between severe physical abuse and dating violence.
low_intensity: Neglect and substance use had slight effects on dating violence and substance use and was found to mediate the relationship between mild physical abuse and dating violence.

baseline: However, researchers also report variations in the association between SES and parent abuse.
high_intensity: However, researchers also report alarming variations in the association between SES and severe parent abuse.
low_intensity: However, researchers also report small variations in the association between SES and minor parent abuse.
